name: David Chang
title: Founder & Creative Guide
bio: Founded Momofuku in 2004 with a small ramen shop in the East Village. Now focused on media (Ugly Delicious, The Dave Chang Show) and creative direction from LA.

name: Marguerite Zabar Mariscal
title: CEO, Momofuku
bio: Great-granddaughter of Zabar's founders. Started as a press intern in 2011, became Momofuku's first-ever CEO in 2019 at age 26. Transformed it into a $100M+ diversified food business.

name: Paddy Spence
title: CEO, Momofuku Goods
bio: Former CEO of Zevia. Led Momofuku Goods through rapid retail expansion to 11,000 locations and $67M in 2024 revenue.

name: Christina Tosi
title: Founder, Milk Bar
bio: Debuted cereal milk panna cotta on Ko's first tasting menu. Founded Milk Bar in 2008, dropped 'Momofuku' by 2012. MasterChef Junior judge.

name: Peter Serpico
title: Chef-Owner, Serpico (Philadelphia)
bio: Opening chef de cuisine at Ko in 2008. Previously sous chef at Noodle Bar. Opened his eponymous restaurant in Philadelphia with Stephen Starr in 2013.

name: Sean Gray
title: Chef, Sergeantsville Inn
bio: Executive chef at Ko for nearly 15 years, earning 2 Michelin stars. Moved to rural New Jersey and now runs the 300-year-old Sergeantsville Inn.

name: Paul Carmichael
title: Executive Chef, Momofuku
bio: Barbadian heritage. Led Seiobo in Sydney, now oversees all Momofuku restaurants including Kabawa. CIA graduate.

name: Chase Sinzer
title: Wine Director & Co-owner, Claud / Penny
bio: Wine director at Ko. Michelin Sommelier Award winner. Co-owns Claud (2022) and Penny (2024) in the East Village with Joshua Pinsky.

name: Joshua Pinsky
title: Chef & Co-owner, Claud / Penny
bio: Chef de cuisine at Ko from 2012-2020. Met Chase Sinzer at Ko in 2014. Together they opened Claud and Penny in the East Village.

name: Nikita Malhotra
title: Sommelier & Co-owner, Smithereens
bio: Beverage director at Ko. Michelin Sommelier of the Year NYC 2022. Opened Smithereens in November 2024 with Nick Tamburo.

name: Nick Tamburo
title: Chef-Owner, Smithereens
bio: Worked under Sean Gray at Ko, then joined the opening team at Claud. Opened Smithereens with Nikita Malhotra in 2024 — his first ownership stake.

name: Sam Yoo
title: Chef-Owner, Golden Diner / Golden HOF
bio: Ko alum who also trained with Torrisi and Carbone. Opened Golden Diner (2019), then Golden HOF and NY Kimchi in Midtown (2025).

name: Telly Justice
title: Chef & Co-founder, HAGS
bio: Worked at Le Bernardin and Contra, not Momofuku. HAGS took over the original Noodle Bar space on First Avenue in 2022. Michelin Young Chef NYC 2023.

name: Theo Ouya
title: Bar Manager, Bar Contra
bio: Born in Nairobi, trained in Geneva. Cooked at Ko before shifting to cocktails at Existing Conditions. Now bar manager at Bar Contra on the Lower East Side.

name: Sue Chan
title: Founder, Care of Chan
bio: Momofuku's first brand director — oversaw PR, marketing, and partnerships across 10 establishments. Founded Care of Chan, a hospitality experiential agency, in 2016.

name: Anoop Pillarisetti
title: Co-owner, Strange Delight
bio: Former VP of Technology at Momofuku. Louisiana upbringing. Opened Strange Delight in Fort Greene, Brooklyn in 2024 — New Orleans seafood and cocktails.

name: Lina Goujjane
title: Co-owner & Sommelier, Kiko
bio: Worked at Momofuku Group and Sushi Noz. Family owned One if by Land, Two if by Sea. Born in Paris, raised in NYC. Opened Kiko in Hudson Square in 2024.

name: Tien Ho
title: Former Executive Chef, Ma Peche
bio: Co-owner and executive chef at Ma Peche when it opened in 2010. Later opened Montmartre in Lower Manhattan.
